content: crochet a cute **coffee mug amigurumi** for your collection of handmade christmas tree ornaments or use your coffee cup as a keychain or gift tag *this pattern is written in us terms* **materials** 2 75-mm c/2 usa 12 uk crochet hook dk 3 medium weight yarn one stitch marker to work in the round poly-fil or cotton stuffing tapestry needle **yarn** i used paintbox yarns cotton dk 137 yds 125 m per 50 g in the following colors **red** pillar red 415 **brown** coffee bean 411 **light brown** soft fudge 410 **white** champagne white 403 feel free to use any yarn with the appropriate hook **size** the mug measures 1 6 4 cm by 1 8 4 5 cm **gauge** this pattern is too small to accurately determine the gauge **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are the property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni
